page.title: 13COMMUNICATIONS IN MORELEIGH
page.content:
A tall steel tower, which is visible from many parts of the South Hams is a prominent feature of this block. This is a microwave tower,part of British Telecom's National Network System. It carries telephone and television links for the U.K. and Abroad.
Moreleigh has a sub-Post Office, 2 postboxes and 1 public telephone. The Post Office houses an information board which carries notices of local interest. Halwell has a public telephone and a postbox. There is a local notice board in the Public House
There are two local papers,which cover a wide area but have different front pages featuring each district - both are published weekly.
